remarks: The vector to functional map value is a functional.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
hvmaplfl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hvmaplfl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmaplfl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hvmaplfl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hvmaplfl.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
hvmaplfl.m $e |- M = ( ( HVMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmaplfl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hvmaplfl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
hvmaplfl $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` X ) e. F ) $.
